title: Any news on Death recap?
body:
What's going on with the Death Recap update?

Because this
http://imgur.com/a/WS0UE
has ceased to be helpful at all!

I died at full health from 412 damage.
Sona gave Vi damage, but didnt get an assist, instead a Minion got it?
I wasn't hit by a single heim turret despite diving into the middle of them _(I must be Jesus)_.
and the 2600 or so damage that I'm guessing Twitch did to me, apparently didn't happen.

its gone from not being very clear at times, to just being straight up comedy to entertain you while you're dead.

I don't know how many people use it, but I use it a lot, I like to see where the damage is coming from in team fights, and adjust my build and strategy accordingly. Plus when you die randomly after leaving a fight and have no idea what killed you, its nice to get a bit of clarity. But you cant do any of those things in its current state.

replies.body: At least it doesn't show you playing Lucian and doing 5% true damage to yourself with an auto attack... Then getting an assist for it. Apparently friendly fire was a thing.
Ive had the same thing, but the damage was the colour of magic damage (purple) and said 'True damage' next to it.
did you get an assist for a self kill?
